title: What will happen to AR pen Runes?
body:
With the upcoming removal of flat armor pen in favor of lethality what is going to happen to Armor Pen runes? 

I can't find any sort of official riot statement saying they are changing runes to lethality as well ("Flat armor penetration's been changed to Lethality" implies this), removing them entirely or keeping them as they are.

replies.body: They are changing them to lethality.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=liH7WAzA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-05T20:26:59.419+0000)
>
> They are changing them to lethality.

^^

Hybrid Pen runes will also be getting changed to Lethality + Magic Pen.
this makes that rune choice on my physical junglers a wasted IP sink.....
Yeah, champs like Nocturne and Kha will get hard.

Which admittedly I feel screw me over since now I gotta replace my hybrid quints on Sion. 

There's plans for a Rune rework in the midseason correct?  If so, any idea how it would effect pricing?
then, how will u change the armor pene mastery in ferocity tree ?

How does the new lethality scaling work again for each level? I remember seeing the lethality scaling somewhere on the boards but I cannot remember the exact formula. Also when does lethality start to become more powerful than the previous flat armor penetration that they used to have?

Will the lethality stay the same?

I love the concept of lethality, but fear (maybe ignorantly) that the changes to the runes would hurt early game significantly more than simply switching to a straight AD rune.

but how will this affect champions like rammus... who want early game power with their mixed damage, instead of partial scaling.

can we just get a refund instead? and choose to rebuy them?
